message.entry: Mean, Variance and Initial seed must be numeric arrays.
Mean and Initial seed cannot be a matrix.

Mean, Variance and Initial seed must be either all scalars, or if more than one of them is a vector, their vector sizes, should agree. If Variance is a matrix, it must be a square matrix with its sides being of the same length as the other vectors.
Standard deviation must consist of nonnegative numbers only.
Standard deviation for Gaussian noise block is not valid.
The covariance matrix must be symmetric and nonnegative definite.
The dimensions of the Mean and Variance for Gaussian noise generator block are not compatible.
